description: Maps coachable state type to the actual behavior it covers (based on https://github.com/samsara-dev/backend/blob/master/go/src/samsaradev.io/safety/coaching/coachingproto/coachableitem.proto)

schema.name: id
schema.description: The numerical value for a coachable item type

schema.name: coachable_item_behavior
schema.description: The name of the associated behavior
